name: TheEasterBunny
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the easter bunny
des:
The Easter Bunny has been busy leaving eggs at a variety of locations from the local park to the North Pole. 

Listen to the Easter Bunny's journey and see if you can remember:

• Where the eggs have been hidden?
• What colour the eggs were?
• How many eggs were left?

Will you be able to remember where all the eggs have been hidden or will the Easter Bunny be too clever?

Features:

• Random locations and eggs means no two adventures are the same
• Funny and surprising sound effects
• Cute graphics for screen devices
• Score saving
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
